name: Enduring Fried Wild Greens

name: Hasty Veggie Cream Soup
notes: Restore three hearts. Must be cooked while wearing the Dark Link costume.

name: Hasty Simmered Fruit
notes:
Has a chance of creating one of two elixers:
Restores four hearts and provides a low-level speed boost for 1:00 minute.
Restores seven hearts and provides a high-level speed boost for 30:00 minutes.
Use a Shard of a Dragon's Horn instead of the Monster Extract for a guaranteed high-level, 30 minute speed boost and 7 & 3/4 health recovery

hearts: 1 ½
name: Campfire Egg
notes: Open flame. Drop carefully on a surface above Link's feet, or the egg will break (recommend doing in Eldin, otherwise starting a fire near enough becomes difficult).

name: Carrot Cake
notes: Use only one type of carrot to add a special effect.

name: Curry Pilaf
notes: You can use any number of these ingredients, this is just the best recipe for heart recovery.

name: Egg Pudding
notes: Add extra ingredients to give it special effects or to increase the hearts restored

name: Fish and Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more fish and mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Fish Skewer
notes: Use other fish or more fish to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fragrant Mushroom Saute
notes: Use more mushrooms and other types of mushrooms to increase the number of hearts it restores or to give it special effects.

name: Fried Wild Greens
notes: Use other vegetables or more vegetables to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fruit and Mushroom Mix
notes: Add other Fruits and Mushrooms to increase Hearts Restored, or to add special effects.

name: Fruit cake
notes: Always use two different fruits in this cake. You may switch the apples or Wildberries for other fruits to add special effects.

name: Fruit Pie
notes: Swap Wildberry for other fruit (such as Palm Fruit) for different results. Adding another fruit amplifies the healing effect. Hearts and price listed are with one Wildberry.

name: Glazed Meat
notes: Use only Raw meat and Courser Bee Honey to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Glazed Mushrooms
notes: Switch the Endura Shroom for a Hylian Shroom or a Stamella Shroom to give it a stamina recovery effect (Energizing glazed mushrooms).

name: Glazed Veggies
notes: Switch the Cool Safflina for Hyrule Herbs to give the meal the Energizing Effect.

name: Gourmet Meat Curry
notes: You can use any Raw Meat except poultry to result in the same dish, but this restores the most hearts.

name: Gourmet Poultry Curry
notes: You can use any Raw Poultry to result in essentially the same dish, but with fewer restored hearts.

hearts: 1 ½
name: Hard Boiled Egg
Herb Saute
notes: Use different herbs or more herbs for different effects.

name: Meat and Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more Meat and Mushrooms to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Meat and Rice Bowl
notes: Use different types of meat to increase the hearts restored

name: Meat and Seafood Fry
notes: Use other or more Meat and Fish to increase hearts restored or add special effects.

name: Meat Pie
notes: You can use any raw meat or poultry, but gourmet meat restores the most hearts.

name: Meat Skewer
notes: Restores twice the number of hearts as the raw meat used. Any 1 meat will work

name: Meat Stew
notes: Use more or other types of meat to increase hearts restored

name: Meaty Rice Balls
notes: Use different types of meat to increase the number of hearts restored.

name: Mushroom risotto

name: Mushroom Skewer
notes: Use other or more Mushrooms to restore more hearts or add special effects.

name: Nutcake
notes: The Acorn can be swapped for Chickaloo Tree Nuts

name: Omelet
notes: Add more ingredients to increase the number of hearts restored and add various effects.

name: Plain Crepe
notes: Add honey to get an Energizing Honeyed Crepe

name: Porgy Meunière
notes: Use only one type of porgy for different effects.

name: Poultry Pilaf
notes: Switch the drumsticks for any poultry meat to restores more hearts.

name: Hearty Elixir
strength: Fully restore hearts & 5 temporarily maximum hearts

name: Hasty Elixir
notes: *Requires Any 1 Monster Part* You can get a free one from Sagessa at the Dueling Peaks Stable.

name: Fairy Tonic
notes: 7 Hearts healing per fairy added. Can be added to anything for 7 hearts healing addition ( w/ Monster Extract not tested ).

name: Electro Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
notes: Restore ten hearts, may randomly provide 13:30 minutes of protection

name: Tough Meat-Stuffed Pumpkin
notes: Restore three hearts - Add various seasoning to increase duration and effect

name: Tough Prime Meat and Rice Bowl
Tough Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
Spicy Pepper Steak
notes: Restores six hearts. Using Raw Prime Meat instead of Raw Meat will bring the heart restoration effect up to seven.

name: Spicy Mushroom Skewer
notes: Restores three hearts. Very easy-to-locate recipe as Sunshrooms are plentiful around Retsam Forest near the Hateno Tech Lab.

name: Spicy Mushroom Skewer
notes:
Restores one heart
Each Hylian Shroom added to the pot grants +1 Heart Restored and an additional +30 seconds of cold resist.

name: Spicy Meat and Seafood Fry
notes:
This is the recipe from the Old Man's Diary.
Add more Spicy Peppers to increase the duration.

name: Spicy Salt-Grilled Meat
notes: Restore three hearts, you can use almost any meat for similar results.

name: Spicy Simmered Fruit
notes: Restore two hearts. Add more fruit or Spicy Peppers to increase duration and hearts restored.

name: Spicy Sauteed Peppers
notes: Restore one heart and provides two and a half minutes of cold resistance.

name: Spicy Fish Skewer
notes:
Restore max health
This recipe does involve a critical success (invoked by the dragon piece), which automatically goes towards boosting the effect strength.
Using fewer fairies can cause this effect to shift to boosting health. Using a lesser dragon part can cause it to shift to boosting duration.

name: Spicy Fruit and Mushroom Mix
notes: Restores five hearts. Possibly the most easily obtained meal for medium-level cold resist.

name: Mighty Simmered Fruit
notes: Restores 1/4 hearts. Must be cooked while wearing the Dark Link costume at night.

name: Mighty Steamed Fish
notes: Restores six hearts - Razorclaw Crab can be swapped out for Mighty Porgy

name: Mighty Prime Meat and Seafood Fry
